title: Timings - Institute of Pharmacy
content:
Title: Timings - Institute of Pharmacy

The University and Institute offices are open as per the following schedule. The offices remain closed on the second and fourth Saturday and public holidays.
| Office Timings | Monday to Friday | Working Saturday |
| Nirma University â€“ Central Office | 11:00 am to 6:30 pm | 07:30 am to 1:30 pm |
| Institutes | 7:30 am to 3:00 pm | 07:30 am to 1:30 pm |
* Timings are subject to change at the discretion of the management.
